bio.intro: I was born & raised in Madrid, based in London since my early teens, and I'm from a small Hispanic nation in Central Africa most often forget ‚Äì Equatorial Guinea
bio.background: I have 7+ years experience, now focused on building with disruptive tech and actively assembling multi agent systems
bio.context: I've put the reps in with the tools I use to solve problems ‚Äì NextJS and React with Typescript, SQL and NoSQL, Python, and many more. I dedicate a good chunk daily to learning new skills
bio.beyondTech: When I'm not programming, you can find me sharing insights online, exploring new ideas to push the boundaries of what's possible, or travelling since I'm heavy on learning languages and cultures
bio.alt: Portrait of Enric Trillo, standing confidently with graduation attire, exuding a approachable and joyful aura.
